title: MFM Minisode 30
description: On this week's My Favorite Murder minisode, Karen and Georgia read your hometown tales including the terrifying discovery in a crawlspace, the tragic murder of Micaela Costanzo, and the Smiley Face Bomber.
author: exactlyrightmedia@gmail.com (Exactly Right)
